How You Can Help

Get Involved · Support · Share

Actions You Can Take

  • Join local trail groups and adopt canopy-pool stewardship.
  • Participate in our Community Science Program.
  • Share educational materials with schools and outdoor clubs.
  • Write representatives to recognize sensitive canopy habitats.
  • Consider a donation: see Donate / Get Involved.

Spread Awareness

Place a trout ribbon on your website or socials linking back here. Joyfully encourage curiosity about canopy ecology and forest stewardship.
